summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3508r the improvement of 40th Avenue Southwest, 41st Avenue Southwest, and 42nd Avenue Southwest, from West Morgan Street to the south line of Gatewood Gardens, an addition to the City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43455 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
